channel.title: Life on Stuart Blackler's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Stuart Blackler's Blog

item.title: My 2017
item.description: I've been thinking about writing this post for a little while now, but never seem to get around to it. I know that I'm massively late to the 2017 blog post party, but I didn't really think about it for quite a while. I wanted to refocus and find out what I really wanted to achieve rather than a token guesture that would likely fail like previously. I've split this out into two main categories below: Personal and Professional Development.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World. Safe to say it's been a little while since I have blogged or even had a website come to think of it. Alas, I am back with some fresh ideas and recharged to help you dear reader.

item.title: Becoming An MCP
item.description: As the title suggests, today I passed the 70-483 Programming in C# exam to offically become a Microsoft Certifed Professional.
